title: How to Change Leather Armour Colour in Minecraft

steps.title: Obtain leather armour and dye.
steps.content: Obtain leather armour and dye. These are the only two things you'll need. Leather armour can be crafted with leather, which is obtained from cows. Dye can be made from flowers, bones, cactus, or by mining lapis lazuli, killing squids, gathering cocoa beans, and/or combining various other dyes.

steps.title: Open your crafting menu.
steps.content: Open your crafting menu. Press E or left click a crafting table [unless you changed your controls]. It can either be the one in your inventory or a crafting table. It does not matter.

steps.title: Place your choice of dye and a piece of leather armour onto the grid.
steps.content: Place your choice of dye and a piece of leather armour onto the grid. It does not matter where you place the two items.

steps.title: Preview your item and place it in the inventory.
steps.content: Preview your item and place it in the inventory.

steps.title: Repeat the process with other pieces of leather armour as you wish.
steps.content: Repeat the process with other pieces of leather armour as you wish. Afterward, you could invite some friends to dye some of their armour and you could have an "Armour Show".
